CourseOfferingScheduleTmpl.name: CourseOfferingScheduleTmpl
CourseOfferingScheduleTmpl.description: Represents a template that can be used to define a course schedule.

Description.description: The description of the Course Offering Schedule Template.

EndDate.description: The end date of the course offering schedule.

EndTime.description: The time of day when the Course Offering meeting ends.

IsFriday.description: Indicates that the Course Offering occurs on Friday.

IsLocked.description: Indicates whether the record is locked (true) or not (false).

IsMonday.description: Indicates that the Course Offering occurs on Monday.

IsSaturday.description: Indicates that the Course Offering occurs on Saturday.

IsSunday.description: Indicates that the Course Offering occurs on Sunday.

IsThursday.description: Indicates that the Course Offering occurs on Thursday.

IsTuesday.description: Indicates that the Course Offering occurs on Tuesday.

IsWednesday.description: Indicates that the Course Offering occurs on Wednesday.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed this record or list view (LastReferencedDate) but not viewed it.

MayEdit.description: Indicates whether the record can be edited (true) or not (false).

OwnerId.description: The user who owns this record.

RecurrencePattern.description: The RRULE that describes the recurrence pattern for the course offering schedule. Supports a subset of the RFC 5545 standard for internet calendaring and scheduling. For example, a recurrence pattern of every day for five days would be RRULE:FREQ=DAILY;INTERVAL=1;COUNT=5.

StartDate.description: The start date of the course offering schedule, which is required when there is a recurrence pattern.

StartTime.description: The time of day when the Course Offering meeting starts.

Type.description: The type of course offering schedule, such as class, lab, or exam.
